topics.body:
So Republicans have taken control of the senate; the thing is though they're currently at 52 seats.

Reason why it's not that big of a deal; even though they have 52 seats keep in mind that's not a supermajority meaning they're whole rhetoric about "taking back washington" falls apart.

In other words: not that big of a deal.
